description: Tombs identified in AAA to the southeast of modern Haraza (حرازة) in Algeria's Kabylia province as mapped on BAtlas 30 H4 and 31 A4.

history.comment: summary to include BAtlas 31; added BatlDir references @thomase
cleaned up AAA reference; added references; summary; place type = tomb, tumulus; added BAtlas point locations for each tumulus symbol associated with this numeric assignment @thomase
